      Does a binary search of a given string from a list of file names
      Parameters:
      list - A list of file names to be searched
      searchString - A string to be used for searching
      Returns:
      An integer value indicating if the search string was found.

      public static boolean containsSubstring(String searchMe, String findMe)
      Checks if the givem character sequence appears on a given string
      Parameters:
      searchMe - A string to checked
      findMe - a string that will be looked at if it appears in another string
      Returns:
